1.content:
"You would think that between the three of us we would certainly be able to think of something to do." says Starfire, looking to Raven and then to Terra as she sits on the couch.

"Well, it's never really that exciting when the boys are out." Terra comments.

"I think of it as a much needed break." Raven says, meditating as usual.

Starfire sighs, and looks around. Suddenly...
1.title: Titans with Nothing Better to Do.

11.content:
Starfire smiles as an idea crosses her mind. "Perhaps eating a large meal would get our minds of the boredom?" she suggests with a grin across her face.

Raven shrugs. "I am a little hungry..." she says. Terra nods in agreement.

"Very good, then. I shall prepare the meal, then!" she says as she does just as she said she would, quickly preparing a meal that looks like a mix between the food of her world and regular earth food. Raven and Terra are shocked, although Raven doesn't show it nearly as much as Terra. "Wow...that looks...almost normal..." Raven says.

Starfire nods. "Yes, I have been watching the cooking shows on the TV, and I decided to mix the recipes of my people with the food you produce here on Earth." she says with a wide grin. "I hope it is enjoyable...though this is really the first time I have actually prepared food like this, so I might have made some mistakes."

Terra sweatdrops and giggles a little. "It's ok, let's just eat. I'm sure it'll be...err...fine." She says, as the girls sit down and start eating. The girls seem to enjoy Starfire's cooking so much that they have no problem clearing off the table.

"Wow...I've...never eaten like that." Terra says as she pats her bulging belly.

Raven nods. "I have to say, that was much better than I thought it would be, though I can't say it's doing much for our figures..."

Starfire grins. "I am so glad that you have enjoyed the meal that I made!" She says as she hugs her two friends, all three of their beach-ball sized bellies pressing against each other. "But...I suppose this means we will soon be bored again..." she says. As if on cue, the girls begin to feel oddly...
11.title: Iron Tamaranian

111.content:
Their stomach's growled. No scratch that Starfire was fine but Terra and Raven both felt like they'd never eaten before in their life. They both clutched their distended belly's while Starfire looked on in confusion.

"My friend's what is wrong. Did not my earth styled Glorthrax taste good." The tamaranian said with a small hint of sadness in her voice.

"Glor..thrax? Star I *groan* thought you said it was earth food." Said Terra in pain. Looking around frantically for something to eat.

"What? Oh no friend Terra. It was only made to look like it so you would not be repulsed by it as I have witnessed in the past. It was in fact Glorthrax. One on the most delicous and filling foods on all of Tameran" Said the orange girl with a wide smile now.

"I don't feel full. I feel like I could eat a t-bone the size of the tower." Said Raven in her normal monotone voice.

The alien girl put her hand under her chin thoughtfully.

"I do not understand. Glorthrax is the most filling food a Tameranian can ingest. Any one of my people who consumes the amount I made for each of us would keep them from the hunger for a week."

"And for non-Tamerianian's?" Said Raven this time with a hint of desperation sneaking into her voice.

The alien girl's eye's bulged horribly. She started sweating and looked at the two of them nervously.

"I...forgot that." She stammers as the two bloated and hungry girls give her the evil eye.

"What. does. it. do?" Said Terra. Puntcuating each word.

"On my people it fill's us for a certain time based on how much is consumed. For other species it 'ishheopiskit'"
She mumbles the last part.

"What?" Raven say's. Her eyes now going black.

"It...It does the opposite." She said weakly.

The two stared at her as she rubbed her arms nervously. Looking away from her two friends

"When other species consume Glorthrax they are instead overcome with an uncontrollable hunger that will not go away until the glorthrax has been expelld from their system. No matter how much they eat during that time, they will not be rid of the hunger until the gorthrax is gone and given how much we have eaten I would say that will take a week."

She looked up two see the two girls no longer seated but instead had moved over to the fridge were she heard sounds of chewing and gulping from the two bloated titans.

7 days to go
111.title: Endless Hunger

choices: They're swelling along with their size.
112.content:
Terra scratches her head. "That's odd...I feel quite a bit fuller than I did a few minutes ago. But not with food." she says as her belly continues to bulge out.

"That is very odd...but that would mean that you are filling up with-" Starfire starts, being interupted as Terra accidently lets out a rather loud fart that lasts few moments, which leaves her wide eyed.

"-gas." Raven finishes. "And that probably means all of are like this."

Starfire blinks. "So it seems..." she says, before grinning. The girls blink as Starfire clinches her eyes, still grinning.

Raven and Terra step back, both from the slow expansion of their bellies and from what they're sure Starfire is about to do. Sure enough, Starfire farts and holds it for about 15 seconds, with a look on her face that suggests she enjoyed it.

Terra and Raven raise an eyebrow. "Why did you do that!?" they both ask at once.

"Well, at first I was doing it to see if I would be less bloated afterwards, but after the first few seconds I just held it because...well...it felt wonderful." she says as she looks at her belly, which isn't any smaller than it was before. "Though it seems that it doesn't reduce our size." She says, as their bellies begin to expand into other parts of their body. "Which reminds me...friend Raven, you have not done the farting yet...you should be due now..." Starfire says.

*FRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAT!* went Raven, unable to hold it in any longer. "That...was something I never thought I would do quite like that..." she says.

Terra giggles. "Yeah, but I have to wonder...are we just going to get gassier as we swell up?" she asks, poking her belly, which is now spreading her her torso and her thighs.

Raven nods. "And is it just me...or are we swelling as fast as we are big..."
112.title: Gassy Titans

choices: All three of them fart at the same time.
Their feet begin to expand as well.
1121.content:
They begin to realize that their bodies are going to swell up at a steady rate. "I do not think we are going to expand much faster than we are now." Starfire comments. Terra and Raven nod.

"Yes, but I suppose we should try to find a way to stop this before it gets out of hand." suggests Raven.

As if on cue...
1121.title: What now?

choices: Thier bellies keep getting bigger at a steady pace
11211.content:
Just then, all three girls let out a long and loud fart at the same time.

"Oh my" said Terra.

All three girls beachball-sized bellies were now getting to be basketball-sized. All of the three seemed to like it, though.

"It seems every time we fart, our bellies get bigger" said Starfire.

"How much bigger do you think we'll get?" asked Raven.

"If we keep farting like this, we'll all be the size of a house by tomorrow" said Terra.

"Or tonight" said Raven, letting out another fart. All three of the girl's bellies were getting bigger, along with thier thighs and other parts of thier bodies
11211.title: Farting Around

choices: Lots of little ones from walking around.
112111.content:
"You know, now that I am beginning to find this nice, I actually wish to find a way to get much bigger than we are now." Starfire comments, poking her belly, which produces a quick fart and thus causes it to expand just a little.

Terra and Raven raise an eyebrow. "Err...I really think we should try to avoid getting really, really big. That'll probably leave us vunlerable..." says Terra. Raven just nods.

Starfire sighs. "Well, at least I'm going to try to make myself larger, but how do you think that would happen?" Starfire asks.

Terra blinks. "Well...maybe you could try to let out a really long fart? If occational ones make us bigger, then long ones should have the same effect.

Starfire grins and nods. "Oh, yes! That would most certainly work." She says, grinning as she unthinkingly runs over to Terra and gives her a hug. Along the way, each step she make causes her to pass gas. Raven blinks as she notices that Starfire is bigger than herself and Terra. "Uhm...or maybe just walking around would do it?" she says.

"Oh!? You're right, Raven! It does seem that I am producing gas every time I take a step. While not as efficent as simply passing gas for a long period of time, I suppose it would be rather amusing to get bigger just by walking around...now, which one should I do..."
112111.title: How to get bigger.

choices: it was bigger than the tower!
1121111.content:
As Starfire thinks, her belly gets bigger slowly, along with the other two girl's bellies. Terra's belly was the size of a beach ball, and Raven's belly was about the same size. Starfire's belly was bigger than Raven's and Terra's. They noticed that when they fart now, it doesn't smell at all.
"Well?" asked Raven to Starfire. "which one will you do? Walk or fart?"
In answer, Starfire let loose a long fart that lasted a bit more than a minute. Starfire's belly grew fast, as well as her thighs and even her chest. In fact, Starfire had two chins alreadly, and a third one was on the way. Both Raven and Terra looked on as Starfire's belly got bigger and bigger until...
1121111.title: Bigger from farting

choices: Have Raven teleport her out so she can get much bigger.
Starfire completely fills up the room.
11211111.content:
Terra and Raven blinked, having been forced into one of the corners of the room by Starfire, who now looked similar to a very large orange, only significantly smoother. Starfire's head is in the same corner they are in. Starfire grinned ear to ear. "Amazing! It seems I've made myself into a giant ball!" she exclaimed with glee.

"I'll say..." Raven says as she looks as much of Starfire over as she can.

Terra nods. "But what exactly are we going to do now? We're kinda stuck here..." she says.

Starfire thought for a moment, then grinned.
11211111.title: Almost filled up the room.

choices: She had the urge to join in...
She wanted to play with her gassy friends...
112111111.content:
"Raven, you could teleport me outside and I can grow unhindered!" Starfire said, looking over at Raven who seemed not to mind that idea. Hers and Terra's ability to fart seemed to disappear as they tried to hold them in slightly more, which also allowed them to smell the stench coming off of their blimp of a friend.

"Ech, I think outside is gonna be best, Star." Terra said, and Raven had already begun her spell. Within a moment, the three girls were no longer in the tower but instead, outside in the air. Raven landed safely on Starfires immense back, while Terra wasn't so luck, grabbing hold of her friends rear just to keep from falling. They were too high in the air for Terra to call up some Earth from below. Unfortunately for her, as soon as Starfire felt the pressure of the walls leave her body, she immedately began letting loose a series of loud and smelly farts right into her friends face.

Raven couldn't help but feel a bit of her own prankster side come up, small as it was. After all, how often was it that she could mess with both Star and Terra so easily?

As Terra pulled herself further up Starfire's ass, Raven let loose a simple spell, which pushed Terra's face flying directly into Starfire's buttcheeks, mouth wide open.

What followed next was both hilarious, and slightly arousing for the three of them, a side effect of the gas they all had within them. Terra's head disappeared up Star's crack, trapped and now growing as Starfire unleashed some of her most powerful farts yet, all of which forced down Terra's throat. Terra's body blimped immediately, growing very quickly to match Starfires size and beyond. Her arms and legs stuck out and fattened up, her squished face puffed out within the confines of her friend, and her body seemed to envelope her limbs, next moving on to the now rounding out hands and feet, the latter of which beginning to burst out of their much too small shoes.

Stars body was no slouch either, moving from hot air balloon very quickly onto Zeppelin sizes as her rate of farting just grew and grew. She couldn't help but moan slightly as the feeling of something so far wedged between her butt cheeks. Terra had already gone from being angry to being completely blissful as she just allowed herself to blow up, firing off some pretty incredible farts of her own.

Raven watched this, smelling the rancid air and starting to think her little 'prank' had been an excellent idea... But what now?
112111111.title: High in the sky..

choices: The pressure forces Terra and Raven to fart and get bigger.
112111112.content:
Starfire shut her eyes and proceeded to let out another long fart. Terra yelps as she realized the space between Starfire and the walls was closing in around them. "I hope you do not mind being pressed between me and the wall, my friends, but I feel the need to literally fill up the room." she says.

It doesn't take her very long to have Raven and Terra pinned against the walls. Not wanting to harm Starfire, Terra and Raven were rendered helpless as Starfire began to press them between herself and the walls.
112111112.title: Terra and Raven squished?

choices: The room colapses, giving them more space to expand within.
Starfire stops farting just as they evenly fill up the room.
1121111121.content:
As the pressure between the walls and Starfire's body builds up, their bellies begin to get pressed, which in turn forces Terra and Raven to fart steadily. However, instead of being slowly flattened, the girls end up slowly expanding, which starts to speed up as more pressure is applied ot them. Starfire giggles. "I seems all three of us will soon be filling up the room!" She says as she presses on. Raven and Terra struggle, but find it to be useless as Starfire forces them to get bigger.

Just as the pressure between the three girls begins to be pushed as far as it can go...
1121111121.title: Room filled with the girls.

choices: The girls burst in one spot, which makes them deflate until they're flat.
They burst into rubbery pieces, with only their heads intact.
11211111212.content:
Suddenly, Terra and Raven feel their own expansions stop as Starfire decides to come to a stop for some reason. The girls try to communicate with each other, but their words are muffled beyond comprehention due to each girl's face being right in front of another girl's body.

However, it seems like this problem is merely a temporary one, as another problem begins to surface. Stafire was already as big as the room was when they begun, and as a result, the three girls were squeezed very tightly within the room. The girls could hear all sorts of creaking, though they were not sure wether or not the creaking was coming from the room or their bodies. Their worries are confirmed as they feel a jolt go through them, telling them that their bodies would give at any moment.
11211111212.title: Under Pressure

choices: The girls' heads and bodies get mixed up.
112111112122.content:
A second later, the girls feel themselves come undone all over as their bodies burst into hundreds of rubbery shreads. The next thing they know, all that's left of them that could possibly be considered intact is their heads, which are now falling towards the floor. They all hit the ground and look up to see their bodies scattered all over the room in a mix of orange, light tan, and light grey.

"This is most interesting...it seems we have survived being blown to bits!" Starfire exclaims with a grin on her face.

Raven sighs. "Yes, but look what's happened to us! What are we supposed to do now?"

"Excuse me if I am incorrect, but wouldn't we still be able to use our powers even in this condition? Maybe if you focused hard enough, Raven, you could bring our bodies back together." Starfire suggests. Terra nods as well as a disembodied head could.

"Alright, but I'm not sure if this will actually work or not..." Raven says, as she begins to focus her powers...
112111112122.title: BANG!

1121111121221.content:
As Raven focused her power on herself and her two friends, their bodies slowly regenerated back to their normal selves.

Terra stretched as she felt her normal self again. "Oh man, that was a blast..no pun intended." Raven rolled her eyes as Starfire giggled a little. "Altough it was indeed fun," Starfire pointed out. The other two nodded at her and smiled.

Suddenly..
1121111121221.title: Normal Again

choices: Something cartoony happens to one of em
11211111212211.content:
As Control Freak appeared on the TV, the girls were started by his fat head.

"GREETINGS TITANS!" he shouted..looking around only seeing the girls. "YOU?...What are you 3 doing there, where are the guys?"

"They're not here you fat bulbous freak," Terra shouted. The 3 were ready to attack when Control Freak interrupted. "Not so fast, I'll just use you instead HAHAAHAA." and with that he zapped them all to a mysterious world filled with bright colors, bizarre shapes, and everything crazy.

Raven wasn't amused, having to deal with Larry's World awhile back. "Where are we?" she demanded. Control Freak wasn't to be seen, but heard. "Why your in my little cartoon world, where my own creations run amuck, causing chaos..and now you're a part of it!" He said as his laugh echoed away.

The girls decided to look around when..
11211111212211.title: Welcome to my Cartoon World

choices: Raven or Terra pushes her out of the way.
112111112122112.content:
As the girls navigated the strange world, Starfire noticed a dark object floating in the sky with seemingly nothing keeping it held up. She tries to fly up higher to get to it, but finds that she can't. "It seems that the Control Freak has severely limited our powers." Starfire says as she squints at the object as it hovers overhead.

"How shocking." Raven says in a sarcastic tone. The moment that Starfire takes her eyes off of the object to look in Raven's direction, the girls hear an oddly familiar whistling sound. Starfire blinks and looks back up only to see the dark object falling toward her. Since it's not so far away now, the girls are able to recognize it as a larger-than-normal anvil. Starfire barely has time to yelp before...
112111112122112.title: Curiosity + Anvil = One flat girl.

1121111121221121.content:
The anvil that slams down on Starfire makes a clean squish-thud noise. The girls gasp as they see part of Starfire's flattened form under the anvil, and watch as the anvil fades away to reveal Starfire flattened in the shape of a disk. Starfire is unconscious for a moment, then opens her eyes to see her friends standing over her.

"I guess Control Freak wasn't kidding when he said we were in a cartoon world...we have to get out of here soon, or all three of us are going to end up like Starfire." Terra says.

Raven nods. "But first, we'd better find a way to restore Starfire. If we take her out of here as is, she might get stuck that way."

Starfire blinks. "But how would we do that?" she says. They look around, and notice there seems to be some kind of gas station. Or rather, a couple of gas pumps that have the word 'Air' on them. "Well, that would solve that..."

"Maybe, Starfire...but which one...how do we know one or both of them won't actually be a gas pump?" Raven explains.

Terra smirks a bit, recalling the events from earlier. "If it's the kind of gas we've had, it won't really matter, will it?" she says with a giggle.

Raven sighs, and looks at a couple of selection buttons on the pump. "'Gas' and 'not Gas'...that's just...great." She says, as she presses...
1121111121221121.title: The 'Gas' Pumps.

11211111212211211.content: Raven sticks the nozzle into Starfire's mouth and pulls the trigger to start filling Starfire up with some kind of gas...
11211111212211211.title: Gas, you say?

choices: Terra and Raven break free before they're made gassy.
112111112122112111.content:
Raven sticks the nozzle into Starfire's mouth and pressed the 'gas' button. She lets out a sigh of relief as she starts to fill Starfire up with what seems to be air. Once Starfire has retained her normal form, Raven pulls out the nozzle and Starfire sits up.

"Ahh...it is wonderful to be three dimentional once again!" Starfire exclaims as she stretches. "But I feel bloated...I wonder why..." she says, before she suddenly farts, which causes her to bloat up a little, although significantly more than farting would have bloated her earlier.

Raven rolls her eyes. "Oi...here we go again."

"Don't be so worried, friend Raven. At the very least, only-" Starfire begins, before stopping as she farts loudly. "-I'm gassily bloated this time."

As if on cue, the nozzles from the gas pumps suddenly wrap around Raven and Terra and then plunk themselves into their mouths.
112111112122112111.title: Gassy once more.

choices: The bunnies put them in a ball machine
1121111121221121111.content:
Raven and Terra use all their might to break away from the nozzles, along with destroying em.

"No way I'm gunna embarrass myself again," Raven said. Terra just looked at Starfire's bloating/flatulence mix. "Geeze Star," she remarked.

Raven, not wanting to deal with Star's odor put Terra on one side of Star, and herself on the other. "On my mark, and we push Star's body together..1..2..GO!" And with that they push on Star's body, making Star fart very loudly and so nauxious that it kills a bunch of cartoony trees behind me.

Star blushed and waved her butt with a gental 'pardon me.' Raven got frustrated and wanted to leave, when a bunch of muscular basketball players that resembled bunnies came up. "Oh just great, even the fat boy has bunnies," Raven said unamused.

One of the rabbits grabbed her, making her eyes pop out of her head real quick. "We need a new basketball, and me and your little friends think you would be perfect." The girls gulped as the rabbits took them over to their court.
1121111121221121111.title: Bunnies?

choices: Starfire and the other girls are able to bounce on their own.
The girls are subjected to the bunnies' game.
11211111212211211111.content:
The bunnies chuckled as they carried the girls over to what looked like a bowling ball return, except it has a funnel on the top that looks like it could be used to stuff someone into the machine. The bunny closest to the machine grabs Starfire first and jams her into the machine before she can say another word, then quickly does the same to Raven and Terra.

The bunnies watch intently as the three girls roll out of the ball return-like device, now spherical with their faces sticking out. "We do not want to participate in this game as the balls!" Starfire shouts as a bunny goes to pick her up. She tries to see if she can bounce into the bunny in an attempt at escaping from them.
11211111212211211111.title: Balls for Bunnies

choices: Take the first path, which leads to a lake of bubbles.
112111112122112111111.content:
Starfire slams hard into the bunny approaching her, and then bounds over the the bunny she just knocked over and bounds up and down on it until it vanishes in a poof. Raven and Terra get the idea and do the same exact thing to the rest of the bunnies. Once they're finished defeating their would-be captors, they roll over to each other.

"As powerful as we seem to be like this, I'm sure that those bunnies were not expecting us to strike back like that. We should find a way to return to or normal forms before we run into something that's ready for us!" Starfire says. Raven and Terra rock back and forth a little to simulate nodding.

With that, the girls roll around to find a way to restore themselves. Eventually, they come across two paths, neither of which seems to go anywhere in particular...
112111112122112111111.title: Battle Balls

1121111121221121111111.content:
As the girls roll, they soon get to a small lake with bubbles coming out of it. Starfire giggled because she loved to blow bubbles around the tower and pop em.

Terra was weirded out by why bubbles would be coming out of a lake, but with nothing in it of any sort. Raven just thought of em as regular bubbles. Star wanted to pop one.

"Oh may I play with some bubbles first?" Starfire asked. Raven gave off a short sigh and Terra smiled. "Sure Star..I don't see any harm," she said. Starfire bounced around in her ball form and proceded to pop bubbles. Raven sat away meditating..even as a ball. Terra watched Star enjoy herself, but she noticed Star's sphere body was bloating, making her skin tight.

"Star?" She told her. "Your body..it's bloating!" Starfire finally noticed and began to worry. "Oh, why am I feeling tiiiight?..It must be the bubbles!." Then Starfire's ball body exploded into confetti like shreds with her colors of red, orange and purples. The girls began to shock and yell for Starfire, when suddenly, Starfire appeared, with her oringinal body. Star blinked and examined. "My body..I am normal! The bubbles restored me!" she said as she began to pop a bubble.

Terra smiled and went to pop some too, going through the bloating, the tightening, along with popping and restoring. Star continued to pop, but her body bloated all around, and popped again, only to be restored. Terra didn't want to do that again, and Raven decided to get it over with too.

Finally after the girls were normal again, and after Star went through the bloating and popping 4 times, they continued to the path and found..
1121111121221121111111.title: Bubble Lake

11211111212211211111111.content:
As the girls walk along, they end up in the middle of a very hot desert. While Starfire and Raven are able to fly over the hot ground, Terra isn't so lucky. Even if she did use the sand to glide across the desert, it would still be just as hot.

"Ugh...it's so hot that I think I'm about to melt..." Terra says, before she notices she's up to her waist in what she first believes is sand. However, when she actually looks down at her legs, she sees the rest of her body is forming into a peach colored puddle with black spots all along. "...oh my god I am melting!" she shouts.

This prompts Raven and Starfire to turn around to see Terra...
11211111212211211111111.title: Liquid Terra

choices: Is some kind of factory with a Terra-shaped mold within.
112111112122112111111111.content:
Raven and Starfire can do nothing but watch as Terra becomes a irregularly shaped splotch on the surface of the sand. However, Terra seems to be very much alive, and conscious too.

"Aaaaaaa! Help me! Dig me out or something! It's even worse now that I'm embedded in it!" Terra shouts in a pained tone.

---

After a few hours of digging, Starfire and Raven manages to get Terra's liquidified form out of the sand and into a jar, which Starfire has elected to carry. "Do not worry, friend Terra. We will have you restored to normal as soon as we can."

Terra's eyes bob up and down. "As long as I don't evaporate before then, I should be fine..." she says, as the group gets out of the desert area. The next area they reach...
112111112122112111111111.title: Stuck in the sand.

1121111121221121111111112.content:
The desert abruptly ended and was replaced by the lawn of a huge factory.

"Look friend Terra, perhaps there is a way to restore you in there." said an optimistic Starfire still holding the jar of Terra.

"A little too convenient for my taste. I think we should just skip it." said a pessimistic Raven.

"Well when you become a jar of goo you can call the shots. Take me in Star." gurgled Terra.

They walked into the factor to see a conveyor belt and several Terra shaped molds.

"See Raven, all this factory contains only helpful things." says Star as she gazes at the machninery.

"This is so a trap." said Raven.

They quickly set up the machine in a way that looked like it would work. Terra was poured into a bowl. The bowl would pour into a mold and the mold would be heated. At least that's what it looked like would happen. The only problem now was how to get the thing started.

Starfire and Raven glared at the panel of switches, levers, and buttons. All of them marked in what looked like Russian.

"What's taking so long?" gurgled an angry Terra.

"Raven does not the green button mean go?" said Star as she slowly reached for it.

"Stop!" Raven screamed, "What if it's a trick?"

"We must do something or Terra will remain goo forever." said Star as she pushed the button.

and then...
1121111121221121111111112.title: What a Convenient Factory

choices: They were all shaped like Terra
11211111212211211111111122.content:
Just as Star pushed the button, two robotic hands grabbed both her and Raven.

They were forced into molds as Terra was poured into hers.

They were heated, shaken, and cooled.

When it was all over the molds were openned to reveal...
11211111212211211111111122.title: Something goes horribly wrong

choices: He chews the other two up like gum
11211111212211211111112.content:
The girls found themselves in a giant city, buildings everywhere.

"This..city looks oddly like Jump City, but there are no people," Starfire pointed out. "Strange indeed Star." Raven replied.

Suddenly they felt a shake of the ground and Raven looked at Terra. "Hey, I didn't make the earth move," Terra said. When suddenly they heard a giant roar. The girls turned around and saw a giant godzilla like monster running through the city like a playground.

"This place is so messed up," Raven said. The lizard then saw them and wanted to play with them like dolls, instead of eating em. (He's a vegetarian, sorta.) The girls couldn't get move because the ground was shaking too much, as the lizard ran, he accidently ran pass, making a slight squish sound. Terra and Starfire looked at the lizard seeing that the lizard stopped in front of em, but Raven was missing.

The lizard looked at his foot and saw Raven, who looked like a chewed up piece of gum stuck to his foot, and pulled off the splattered Raven and through her in his mouth to chew up. Starfire and Terra were just shocked in awe as they saw Raven being chewed up like a doggy toy. Then..
11211111212211211111112.title: Monster City

112111112122112111111122.content:
The lizard makes a noise that one might think would be 'bleh' and spits out Raven, who lands on the road right next to Starfire and Terra. Raven currently looks like an extremely large wad of blue-colored gum. The lizard grins and quickly grabs Starfire and Terra while they're still looking at Raven in awe. The lizard doesn't give them a chance to react and throws them in his mouth. Like Raven, Starfire and Terra get chewed up until they resemble Orange-Purple and Tan-Black colored gum, respectively.

133.content:
Just as Starfire was going to suggest something, Raven stood up and simply stated, "Well, I guess I will use this free time to look at some magic texts I've been meaning to get to. Call me when we will inevitably order Pizza."

Starfire stuttered for a moment and said, "That sounds like a good idea Raven. I will come and tell you when we decide to order the pizza. What of you friend Terra?"

Terra yawned and stretched for a second then said, "I might just go nap." With that, the three girls split up.

Raven arrived in her room a few minutes later, walked in, closed the door, and smiled. She loved her room, comfy, dark, and full of arcane knowledge. Calling on her powers of levitation, Raven floated to the top of her bookshelf for that is where she stuffed most of her new books she had not gotten around to reading just yet. There were several titles at her disposal, each one with a uniquely powerful name that conjured images of great power and sorcery. However, none of these tomes caught her eye. Instead, a small pinkish white book caught her attention. It was a simple and plain cover with not even so much as a title. Pulling the book out, Raven began to flip through the pages reading spell after spell as she floated down and sat down on her bed.

Continuing to read through the text, Raven grew more and more curious with each passing moment. The language of the book was foreign and yet familiar to her yet each spell she passed lead to another with even more power. Finally, Raven's fingers landed on a small spell about mid-way through the book that she recognized... kind of. It was an ancient spell, she could tell that much, but she could not tell what it did. Consumed by curiousity, Raven began to slowly sound out the phrase, "Ono... e`nauk tul... amantshe." Upon reading the spell, there was a quick flash. Raven had unknowingly cast the spell, not knowing the book used the reader's innate magical ability to cast the spells inside as opposed to the caster choosing to cast the spell. What spell did Raven cast?

1331211.content:
Not realizing she had just cast a spell, Raven yawned loudly. "Must not have slept as well as I thought I did." Raven then leaned back onto her soft, black bed and closed her eyes.

Raven was startled awake by the sound of knocking at her door. "Raven... Raven... are you there Raven?" It was the sound of Starfire coming from the other side.

"Yeah Starfire, what is it?" answered Raven as she floated up, not noticing the bit of looseness in her leotard or the slight extra space in her shoes. Floating to the door, Raven opened it to see Starfire smiling her usual smile.

"The Pizza has just been delivered. Shall we all partake of the cheese goodness?" said the red-haired Tamarrian.

"Sure why not?" said Raven as she landed and backed alongside Starfire to the kitchen. If Raven had instead followed Starfire, she might have noticed the extra looseness in her skirt.

Upon arriving in the kitchen, Raven was surprised by the ten unopened pizza boxes sitting on the counter and the three already empty opens that lay strewn on the ground due to Terra's gorging. "Well, someone was hungry," stated Raven as she walked into the kitchen and grabbed a slice of pizza. Terra was too busy smiling and eating to respond let alone notice her normally tight boots felt loose and that only her toes could reach the ground as she sat guzzling pizza.

What happens next?

13312111.content:
Both Raven and Starfire sat at the table and began to eat. The delicious smell of pizza and their hungry stomachs distracted Raven from noticing how her feet barely grazed the floor while Starfire's feet though able to touch where probably just a few minutes away from dangling as well.

"So friend Terra," began Starfire between mouthfuls of pizza, "What did you decide to do on this day of rest and vacation?"

The blond did not answer immediately as she first had to finish the pizza slice in her hand... and the two on her plate. "Oh, just some basic training. Trying to get more control over my powers. After that I took a nice long shower."

"I noticed," remarked the Red-haired girl. "Your hair has a very clean and happy scent. Quite nice indeed."

"Yeah, I noticed as well," commented Raven in one of her harsher tones, "when I stepped on a pile of mud someone left in the second level's shower room."

"Oh, right sorry about that," answered Terra with a mild blush, her hand scratching the back of her head as if to help her pick and excuse from her head.

"Terra friend," came Starfire's voice, "I do not wish to... "get on your case," but I too have stumbled across the iky dirt and mud you leave in the shower. Please try harder in remembering to clean up your mess."

"Right, right," smiled Terra, "I get it. I'm just absentminded about that stuff. I promise I will try harder to make sure the shower is clean after I use it." Terra then gave a salute as if to seal the promise, but it was followed by an odd thud. Looking around, all three girls wondered what had made the sound. Was it a villain come to wreck his vengeance, were it stalkers trying to get creepy pictures, or was it some other threat? Glancing under the table, Terra soon found the cause. "Sorry guys, looks like my shoe fell off," said Terra as she raised up her left foot revealing a soft, crew length white socked foot. Placing it on the table, as proof Terra soon garnered odd looks from her friends. "What?"

"Are you not going to put it back on Friend Terra?" asked Starfire.

"Nah,why should I?"

"Because as part of Robin's rules, we must be ready to act at a moment's notice," answered Raven this time.

"Well, Robin's not here. What's the harm in kicking back one day, on our day off in fact." As if to enforce her statement, Terra's right leg quickly kicked forward her loose shoe flying across the room and falling into the wall before sliding to the floor. Her right foot then joined her left atop the table, though Terra shifted her left so as one foot was on either side of her pizza. Raven was about to object to Terra's crude manners when she heard a giggle and two thuds. With a inaudible groan, Raven looked to see that Starfire had joined in the relaxing as she too discard her shoes revealing a pair of pink knee socks, no doubt a gift from Robin.

"Come friend Raven, join us in our relaxing."

With a glare, Raven was about to refuse when her shoes decided for her. With two quick thuds, Raven sudden felt a breeze against her feet. Looking down she saw her shoes discarded on the ground and two black ankle socked feet seemingly smiling at her. "Hurray for friend Raven. Let us continue with more cheesy pizza."

"Already there," answered Terra not noticing that the slices seemed slightly bigger than they were just a few moments ago. Unable to go back now, Raven leaned back in her chair and continued to eat her pizza, unaware of what would happen next.
13312111.title: The girls continue to shrink and do not notice?

133121111.content:
The three girls continued to chat for a bit, each taking an occasional slice or bite. Not wanting to deplete her friend's pizza supplies, Terra decided she would bring over another pizza just for her. Getting off from the chair Terra walked over to the kitchen countertop where a few more pizzas were stacked. Too distracted by the enticing smell of pizza, Terra did not notice that the countertop seemed slightly more elevated than usual. What did strike her as unusual was that the stack of pizzas must have grown or something as she was now forced to reach for the top box. Stranding on her socked tiptoes and stretching out the rest of her form, Terra was able to grasp the top most box and pulled it into her waiting arms. Terra then spun around back towards the table, took one step, then tripped over something causing her to face plant right into her beloved pizza.

Hearing the crash behind them, Starfire and Raven turned to see Terra faceplanted into the pizza. Getting up, Starfire went over to the fallen Terra and helped her out of the pizza. "Friend Terra are you alright?"

The blond-haired girl answered as she spat out a small sausage worth of pepperoni and meat, "Yeah, I'm fine Star. Thanks for asking. But, what the heck did I trip on?" Looking both girls were surprised to find Terra's brown shorts down around her ankles, the obvious culprit. Lifting her leg, Terra watched as her shorts slid down her leg back to her white panties. "Okay, that's just weird?"

"What is friend Terra?" asked Starfire, as she helped her pantless friend back to her socked feet.

"When I put these shorts on today, they were actually pretty tight. Now, they're like at least an inch if not two too big for me."

"Maybe all your gorging," came Raven's voice, "Stretched out your pants."

"Woah, woah, I do not gorge," retorted Terra as she threw her overly large shorts away and stomped over to Terra, her T-shirt reaching down just enough to cover he panties.

"Tell that to the five to seven pizza boxes over there." Raven then motioned to a stack of pizza boxes that Terra had discarded, their lids open as if they were carcasses left over from some demon's organ feast.

"So I admit I eat alot, but I do not gorge."

Raven just stared blankly at her, unsure if the girl was trying to defend herself or hide the truth from herself.

Seeing her tactic was failing, Terra turned the subject away from her appetite. "Well, at least even with all my eat it, I still look good."

"Whatever... gorger."

Annoyed by how Raven was pointing out her flaws, Terra turned to Raven and thought of a plan. "Raven look there!"

Raven, thinking more on reaction than anything else, quickly spun around and prepared for anything that might be thrown at her. However, what she wasn't expecting was for Terra to run up from behind and pull Raven's cape over her face, unzip her leotard which quickly fell down to Raven's ankles, and push her. Terra then planted foot between Raven's breasts as if claiming victory.

"What was that for!" shouted Raven as she shrugged Terra off and stood to her feet, her cape covering her.

"For calling me a gorger. Now we're even." Raven was about to retort when both girls sudden saw a pink skirt fly between them. Looking, they saw Starfire pulling off her top reducing herself to knee high pink socks, a pair of pink panties, and a pink bra. As she removed her top, Starfire spoke saying, "Friends, friends, let us not fight. This is our day of relaxation, we should enjoy it. Not spend it fighting. I say we should grab take the remnants of the pizza and move to a position on the couch so we may watch a movie on the television."

"If that's the case Star. Why are you taking off your clothes?" pondered Raven as she unconsciously adjusted her panties.

"Well, I was just following both of your examples. Besides, the boys are away. What harm could there be if we reduce ourselves to our undergarments?"

Finding logic in this, Terra quickly yanked off her oversized T-shirt revealing a white sport bra. This left Terra with a bra, white panties, and white crew socks. "Good point Star," said Terra as she jokingly threw her shirt by Raven's head. "Come on Raven. Strip a little. Join us."

Not sure what to think of the two half-naked girls in front of her, Raven finally sighed and unclasped her blue cape revealing her black bra, panties, and ankle socks.

"Hurray for friend Raven," shouted Starfire ash she hugged her gray friend. Raven was about to protest when Terra joined in the hug.

"Come on guys," said Terra, "Let's see what's on the tube." Terra then grabbed the last pizza and charged towards the TV. Starfire and Raven followed shortly after, unaware what was happening to them.

Just then, the villainesses saw Starfire floating through the hallway about to enter the room they currently had Raven twisted with her body mass in her head.

Jinx was quick though and quickly smashed the Raven doll like a pancake between her to hands. The real Raven's body mimicked the doll's and low and behold the Teen Titans living room had a brand new Raven rug. Raven could only gaze up at the ceiling as the doors opened to let Starfire in.

When Starfire flew into the room, Raven tried to scream. But the combination of having her body and lung twisted up and then flattened under her giant head made breathing difficult. In all truth she would have been dead by now had it not been for one small side effect of Jinx's Voodoo.

-----
The Voodoo victim is invincible.
Of course that doesn't mean that they don't feel the mind numbing agony of say being twisted, stretched, and flattened. It's just that while all this is happening the victim can not be physically injured. No broken bones, torn ligaments, or brain damage. The damage to a person's psyche however just might be irreversible.
Jinx thought it was a fair trade off.
-----

Starfire flew quitely into the room. She thought she had seen Raven come in here earlier. She flew up and over the couch when she suddenly got the strongest urge to land. It was as if someone had whispered the order into her ear and she couldn't help but obey.

Starfire landed hard with her steel toed boots digging deep into the rug. Starfire then found herself running in place. This was followed by jumping jacks. Then just regular jumping. Finally she began to run laps around the edge of the rug.

Raven the rug felt it all. The pounding made Raven even flatter than she was earlier. After a while though she became as flat as she was going to get. It began to feel less like Starfire stomping on her and more like Starfire poking her.

Raven began to wonder what was happening to her and Starfire for that matter. Starfire was not one to just spontaniously begin working out. Something must be making her. Or someone. Or someones.

Starfire stopped suddenly.

In the camera room Blackfire had control of the doll now. She brought the doll's ear to her mouth and wispered an order.
15211.title: Starfire's sudden urge to exercise.

choices: She commanded Starfire to take off her boots.
152112.content: "Stay." Blackfire whispered into the voodoo doll's ear. Starfire blinked for a moment, standing there. The three girls chuckled as Blackfire did another mischievous action.
152112.title: Starfire Stays

choices: Raven is molded into a article of clothing for Starfire
1521121.content:
Starfire did as she was told and flung off both of her boots. The smell of sweat and stink wafted from her feet, much to Raven's anger. Blackfire grinned as she ordered Starfire once more. "How about a little workout?" Starfire set a finger on her chin. She suddenly felt like exercising. Unknowingly, she set her smelly feet on Raven's flattened face and flexed her arms. She got down on the ground, digging her toes into Raven's face, and did some push-ups. The smell of the tamaranian's feet made Raven want to gag. Raven felt herself stretch out further as Starfire exercised on her, growing even flatter than before. Raven could do nothing as Star's orange soles sunk into her face once again. The stench was unbearable. Raven was helpless as she absorbed Starfire's sweat and stink. Just when Raven though she would pass out, Starfire lifted her feet off of her flattened face. She shut her eyes in relief. Maybe now she could figure out what was going on...

But before Raven could think about anything, she opened her eyes and saw Starfire's butt descending towards her. Her eyes widened in shock as she was smothered by Star's ample behind and purple skirt. "Ahh.." Starfire moaned as she reached for her toes. Raven wanted to scream as her face slowly enveloped around the orange girl's round cheeks. In a few minutes, Starfire stood up and wiped her forehead. Her lips puckered as she felt a sensation on her behind. She turned around, seeing the rug sticking to her cheeks. "Oh! Teehee.." She brushed the rug off and floated to the kitchen

"Now it's her turn!" Kitten shouted evilly. Blackfire nodded, a devilish grin on her face. She reached for the Starfire doll before being stopped by Jinx. "Wait! How can we be sure Raven isn't taken care of yet?" Jinx interrupted, taking the flattened doll. Blackfire rolled her eyes. "Ugh, fine. But you better be quick." Jinx smiled, having an idea.
1521121.title: She commanded Starfire to take off her boots.

15211211.content: Jinx cackled as she molded the Raven doll into some new clothes for Starfire. In real-time, Raven's flattened form began to shift and shape into...
15211211.title: Raven is molded into a article of clothing for ...

153.content:
"Hmm..." Blackfire pondered, staring at the crystal ball, "I've never seen that blonde girl there before. You're sure she's a Titan?"

Jinx snickered. "You've been away for awhile, haven't you? That's their new recruit. Controls earth or whatever." Kitten scoffed, Jinx twisting around eyeing her.

"She can't control the ENTIRE earth, stupid," Kitten hissed, "Thats WAY too many people." The other two girls looked at each other, then back at Kitten, Jinx burying her face in her palm.

"You're kidding right?" Jinx asked, "She controls the GROUND. ROCK and stuff." She grumbled to herself before picking up the Terra doll.

At the tower, Terra was chilling out on the couch. After taking down Dr. Light with the others, she needed some time to relax. "How many times do you have to deal with that guy, anyway?" She asked, blowing hair from in front of her face.

"If he were much of a threat, I'd actually get tired of him," Raven said before turning her attention back to her book. The blonde went back to her hair, shortly before shutting her eyes for a well deserved nap.

*GROOAAAAAAAAN*

Her eyes shot open. She clutched her stomach, moaning uncomfortablly, rolling off of the couch. With a gasp, Starfire and Raven leaped over to their friend.

"Friend Terra!" Starfire said, picking her friend off the floor, "Are you okay? Do you require assistance?"

"Ugh, I don't know..." Her stomach groaned loudly. "Oh man, I think I need to..." She stumbled up and rushed to the bathroom door, pounding on it. "HURRY UP! Hnnng..." The desperate blonde let loose a loud fart. She grunted and moaned, bringing her hands to her rear, pushing her cheeks together. "Hurry up, hurry uuup!"

"Oh, PRICELESS," Blackfire snickered to herself, watching the poor girl from the crystal ball. "A bit juvenile, but it gets the job done." Jinx chuckled to herself, pouring laxatives into the small doll's mouthslot.

"Pfft, I could to better than that..." Kitten pouted to herself, "That's not even CLEVER..."

Terra couldn't hold it much longer. The poor blonde was pacing back and forth, blasting gas loudly into the air. With a grimace, she groaned, banging on tha door. "WHO'S IN THERE ANYWAY?!" She screamed. "I... I don't think I can make it..."

What should Terra do?
153.title: Tainted Terra

1532.content:
Terra couldn't hold it much longer. With a loud fart, she totally let loose in her shorts. Squealching and squirming. A bit embarassed, but not by much.

"Uh..well then," Raven commented. "Oh man..I need..to really clean up," Terra said. "I don't know what happened, I'm pretty sure I didn't eat anything bad today." "It was not one of my dishes?" a saddened Star asked. Terra nodded assuring Star it wasn't that.

The three bad girls were busting a gut. They enjoyed the dolls like a four year old girl playing with Barbies. "Perhaps Terra's a bit more hungry?" Blackfire said. Kitten and Jinx pretty much had a good idea what Blackfire was thinking. "DOWN THE HATCH!" Jinx shouted.

Jinx then grabbed both the Raven and Starfire dolls, and shoved them into the Terra doll's mouth slot. Raven and Star were suddenly being pulled with no willpower to stop near Terra's mouth. Star's head flew into Terra's mouth first, slightly making the blonde's head bloated out. Star slowly went in closer, and down the throat, finally with an accidental swallow, Terra gulped Starfire whole.

"Oh...crap," Terra said. Raven's eyes shot wide open seeing she couldn't control herself from heading into Terra. Terra tried to run away, but she was trapped in the corner of the room, also with no will to keep her mouth shut. Raven's ass flew into her mouth first, slowly being swallowed. Terra's stomach was nearly bloated like a beach ball, both with Starfire and Raven much alive in there.

Blackfire laughed wickedly to see her sister be eaten by her own best friend. Jinx couldn't help but think that was the coolest thing she's ever seen. "Hey I got an idea," Jinx said. "So do I !" Kitten replied.
1532.title: Down the Hatch

15321.content:
Blackfire threw the dolls to the pink hair girl. "Now watch for some real amusing stuff ladies," Jinx said smiling devilish.

She gave the Terra doll's stomach a squeeze, as the Raven and Star dolls went to the mouth slot area. The real girls had a tight squeeze in Terra's now bloated up head. "Now for the coup de grace,'' Jinx said, making her hands move the mouth of the Terra doll.

Terra slowly moved her mouth up and down, chewing up Starfire and Raven. As spit gathered, the two girls bodies were becoming churned and sticky. Slowly their bodies fused together in color of skin and clothing, with their eyes still in tact. The three wicked girls giggled at such a sight on the TV. "Make her swallow them again!" Blackfire somewhat ordered. Jinx smiled and pushed the Terra doll's head down, making the other two dolls go back into the stomach.

Terra's body was bloated yet again, but now with the girls churned into one gummy blob. "Hey, why not blow some bubbles with em," Kitten asked. "Great idea," Jinx said. "Hehe, but which end should they come from?
15321.title: Sticky Situation

153212.content:
Jinx grins as she realizes what she's going to do with the girls. She puts her hands around the belly of the Terra doll and squeezes downward. "Hehehe, they'll be in for a big surprise!" Jinx says, as the real Terra lets out a few farts. After a few of these, there's suddenly one long fart as what seems to be a large bubble starts to form in the seat of her pants, which soon rip off to reveal a huge bubble composed of Starfire and Raven coming out of her butt. The other girls can't help but cackle at the sight as Jinx continues to force Terra to fart out the bubble.

Eventually...
153212.title: Giving 'bubble butt' a new meaning.
